{this.getBannersComponents()}

); } getBanners() { const banners = [ { headLine: "An Innovative", title: "Digital Enterprise", description: "We develop custom solutions for you no matter your industry or need", link: "#", }, ]; return banners; } getBannersComponents() { return this.getBanners().map((banner, index) => (

)); } } export default Banners;
